WorkItem.Description:
Hello I want use HTML Agility Pack to etract  direct link By a website. 
I try to make different tuto but SelectNodes  doesn't exist in Htmlnodes it's the same thing for load.
In a lot of tuto they propose to make like this:

```
HtmlWeb web = new HtmlWeb();
HtmlDocument doc = web.Load(URL);
```
and like this:
```
doc.DocumentNode.Selectnodes("//div[@class='content']//a[@href]");
```
but VS say Htmlnode doesn't contain a definition for 'Selectnodes'.
